sentence.Network_cn: 纳税者对最近的增加税收十分反感.

sentences.cn: 销售房产给纳税人带来的收益

sentences.en: A responsible government shouldn’t waste the taxpayers’ money.
sentences.cn: 一个负责任的政府不应该浪费纳税人的金钱。

sentences.en: Taxpayers who do not send in their forms face an automatic fine.
sentences.cn: 没有递交表格的纳税人必然面临罚款。

sentences.en: She was declaiming against the waste of the taxpayers’ money.
sentences.cn: 她慷慨陈词猛烈抨击对纳税人金钱的浪费。

sentences.en: Taxpayers are grumbling about the waste of government money,as usual.
sentences.cn: 纳税者一如既往,埋怨政府的钱浪费掉了。

sentences.en: The government will always try to squeeze more money out of the taxpayer.
sentences.cn: 政府总是想方设法向纳税人榨取更多的钱。

sentences.en: The government can’t expect the taxpayer to bail this company out indefinitely.
sentences.cn: 政府不能指望纳税人无限期地帮助这家公司摆脱困境。
